Text: Thankyou. I will try it out
You're welcome, I hope you like it!
I could not patch it in ESR because it was not an DVD. ESR can just patch DVD,not CD. I try to look for an solution
K. I found the solution here on tpb. cd to dvd. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5159884/[PS2]_DVD_Disc_ID_Utility_(DNAS)___CD_to_DVD___patched_with_ESR

Oh, sorry, I had to have Imgburn convert it to an ISO.
I hope that works out. If it doesn't, I could upload the original .bin, since I know you can ESR patch those, too.
plz can you do that. I didnt get it to work. If its not to much trouble^^

Sorry for the wait, here's the .bin:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5595582

Any change to OKAGE (DVD, ISO, whatever) may result in a crash whenever you descend into any of the game's dungeons. Save before entering Madril Sewers, the first dungeon, and if this occurs, try the binary unaltered on CD rather than DVD. OKAGE is a blue-CD disc.

Excellent game, worth the effort. Thanks, TBBear.
